title: Her Dad Stole Her Wedding Gift To Give To His Secret Family + Kristin Shares The Magic Of Bert's Big Adventure Kiddo Malakai
description:
Not only does her Dad have a SECRET FAMILY, he stole her wedding gift to give to the other daughter! What now?!
+
Kristin shared a strong connection with Bert's Big Adventure kiddo Malakai on our last Disney trip. She recently visited Malakai at home and wants to share the meaningful experience. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
